About us

 World is growing fast with economic and technical improvements. Every person is getting engaged with economic activities to lead life. Most of the people in the family spend more time out of the house to earn. Thus there are so many services in the house that need to be fulfilled are not monitored. There are so many things and instruments we use for services in the household. After a long time it needs to be repaired. Also sudden disturbance of instruments makes life difficult. Such as electric service, carpenter service, etc. It needs to be repaired as soon as possible. For the fulfillment the services people search for
 1) acquainted
 2) most secured
 3) best experienced
 4) organized people.
 Our mission is to support them through websites or mobile apps to find the best people for service. In the context of COVID-19 pandemic there are many people who are losing their jobs from different companies. And also there are many small service providers are also reducing employment due to not getting jobs to done thus earning is lessen. There were remarkable freelancer service providers who were servicing, are now lacking calls or jobs. There are causes of not getting jobs/n 1) Do not have institutional marks or;
 2) Do not have proper way to contact them;
 3) People are finding organized service providers. We are now going to organize the service providers to fulfill above mentioned requirements in an online platform. Mission Solve the problems in accordance with people's needs.
